Example.Name: HyperTerminal_Tx
Example.Description: In this example,we send data to the hyperterminal.We use GA8 and GA9 for usart,so we must configure these pins' mode as USART_Rx and USART_Tx function.Here we set the mode to be AFIO_MODE_2.Before transmitting,we should configure the USART with these settings: - 115200 bauds - 8 bits of data - No parity - 1 stop bit - No flow control This code segment suits for ht32f125x serial mcu.
